title: Figure of Cow
description:
Light blue faience figure of a standing cow on oblong base. Scattered and irregular patches of dark blue glaze on body and feet. Body worked in the round. Probably a votive offering to Hathor.

Condition: Head missing. Otherwise excellent.
credit_line: Gift of the Egypt Exploration Fund

museum_location.name: This item is not on view
